PDFs are one of the most common file formats used for sharing and viewing documents. Whether it's eBooks, contracts, manuals, or invoices, PDFs are versatile and widely used. However, not all computers come with a PDF reader pre-installed. This is where Free PDF Reader comes in handy. 

## What is Free PDF Reader?

Free PDF Reader is a lightweight software that allows users to read PDFs for free. Developed by PDFZilla, this software has become a popular choice for those who need a simple yet powerful PDF reader. 

## Features of Free PDF Reader

- Easy to use interface: The software has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy for users to view and navigate PDFs.
- Multiple viewing options: Free PDF Reader allows users to view PDFs in single page, continuous or full-screen mode.
- Zoom in and out: Users can easily zoom in and out of a PDF document.
- Rotate pages: Free PDF Reader offers a feature to rotate and adjust pages orientation for better viewing.
- Annotation tools: Users can also add comments, sticky notes, or highlight important text within the PDF.
- Supports multiple languages: It supports over 40 languages, making it accessible to users around the world.
- Secure and safe: Free PDF Reader doesn't contain any adware, spyware or viruses, and it's completely safe to use.

## Benefits of Free PDF Reader

- Free of charge: Unlike many PDF readers, Free PDF Reader is completely free to download and use.
- Lightweight software: The installation file of Free PDF Reader is small in size, and it doesn't take up too much space on your computer.
- Faster opening time: The software is known for its fast loading speed, allowing users to access PDFs quickly.
- Compatible with all Windows OS: It is compatible with all Microsoft Windows Operating Systems, including Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, and XP.

## Conclusion

Free PDF Reader is a fantastic free software that allows users to access and read PDFs with ease. Its features, compatibility, and benefits make it a top choice for anyone in need of a reliable PDF reader. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who wants to read eBooks, Free PDF Reader is definitely worth checking out.
